CREDITED.Definition: given praise for something that has been done by someone

FRAUD.Definition: the crime of deceiving someone or something in order to gain something

CONSTITUENTS.Definition: people who vote in an area

ABUSE.Definition: use of something in a wrong or bad way

IMBALANCE.Definition: a lack of balance between parties

DECOLONISATION.Definition: when a previous colony gains independence

COMPENSATION.Definition: money that is paid to another person or organisation because they have suffered (financially or otherwise)

PERENNIAL.Definition: lasting for a long time, forever

SUBSIDISING.Definition: paying for part of the cost of something

TURNING IN HIS GRAVE.Definition: to say that someone who is dead would not like a current situation
